intro: Michoxia, commonly known as the silverleaf nightshade, is a genus of flowering plants in the nightshade family, Solanaceae. It consists of a single species, Michoxia heterophylla, which is native to South Africa. The plant is characterized by its silver-gray foliage, which is covered in fine, densely packed hairs. It produces small, bell-shaped flowers that are typically purple or white in color. Michoxia is often grown as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance and hardy nature.
